mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{content}, 0, now(), #{title}, #{user_no}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(group_no) + 1, 1) FROM board b), 1, 0)

insert into board values(null,#{content},0,now(),#{title},#{user_no}, (SELECT b.group_no FROM board b WHERE b.no =#{parent_no}), (SELECT b.order_no+1 FROM board b WHERE b.no =#{parent_no}), (SELECT b.depth+1 FROM board b WHERE b.no =#{parent_no}) )
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update board a, board b set b.order_no = b.order_no+1 where a.no=#{no} and b.group_no = a.group_no and b.no != a.no and b.order_no >= a.order_no
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.group_no, b.order_no, b.depth from board b, user u where b.user_no=u.no order by b.group_no desc, b.order_no asc limit #{counttop}, #{count}

select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.group_no, b.order_no, b.depth from board b, user u where ( b.title like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') or b.content like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') ) and (b.user_no = u.no ) <!-- order by b.group_no desc, b.order_no asc limit #{counttop}, #{count} -->
select b.no, b.title, b.content, u.name, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.group_no, b.order_no from board b, user u where b.no=#{no} and b.user_no = u.no
